title: (x) p2 | output - ITC Conduit {Stephen}
content:
Which font did they use for the body copy?   
It looks so familiar, but I can't put my finger on it just yet.   
   
 [http://www.p2output.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717181057/http:/www.p2output.com/)   
   
thanks!
author: anonymous

comments.content:
actually, it is not i think.   
i have ITC Conduit and it is slightly more narrow than this one.
and the y is for example curved while in the example it is more straight.
maybe they tweaked it a bit in Illustrator?

Hey jaimee. It's [ITC Conduit](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717181057/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily3620.html)   
by Mark van Bronkhorst.   
   
Stephen
